snippet: Ms. Faith, a star in Britain, is releasing her first album in the United States, hoping her brassy, retro, pinup style translates abroad.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with British pop singer Paloma Faith, whose new album Fall to Grace has just been released in America.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Faith, a star in Britain, is releasing her first album in the United States, hoping her brassy, retro, pinup style translates abroad.

headline.print_headline: A Cockney Gal Blends In, for Now, In New York
headline.seo: Paloma Faith Releases ‘Fall to Grace’ in America
headline.main: Paloma Faith Releases ‘Fall to Grace’ in America
